text:

The error that i'm getting on my example is:
"Error: 500

Location: /xslt/book.jsp

Internal Servlet Error:

text:
The InsertWithXSL tag was removed, use the apply tag.  The docs were just
updated and will be available in the next nightly build.
creator: glenn@apache.org
